Server.Name: Great White North Server
Server.Description:
Discord: https://discord.gg/CseFaRD
Selection of mods for the Great White North vanilla server
A special thanks to Spherii for making the Mod Launcher. It has made running a server so much easier. Many thanks to all the mod creators for their hard work. All mods used are unmodified.
Mods included:
***NPC Mods***
XNPCCore - Xyth Fantastic Beastz - Darkstardragon Goblinz Pack - Darkstardragon Knightz N Peasantz Pack Alpha - Darkstardragon NPCX Bird Pack - Xyth NPCX Mech Pack - Xyth Orcz Pack Alpha - Darkstardragon Orcz Pack Beta - Darkstardragon Pit Fighterz Pack - Darkstardragon Raider Gurlz Pack - Darkstardragon Raider Gurlz Pack - Friendly - mr.devolver Raiderz Pack - Darkstardragon Soldier Pack - Darkstardragon Survivorz Pack - Darkstardragon Vault Dwellerz Pack - Darkstardragon Ye OldeUndead Pack - Darkstardragon Zombiez Pack - Darkstardragon
***Other Mods***
3 Slot Forge - Khaine 96 Backpack - Khaine AGF-A20 HUDPlus-EPatch 1.0.1 - AuroraGiggleFairy (AGF) AGF-A20 HUDPlus 1.4.1 - AuroraGiggleFairy (AGF) AGF-A20 Quick Intro Quest 1.01 - AuroraGiggleFairy (AGF) Alyssas scuffed storage VANILLA - everyone that helped me on the discord server Bdubs Vehicles - bdubyah Bee Hives - oakraven, with support from arramus bhw Fashionista - Nuvar bhw InteriorDesign - Nuvar bhw NutsAndBolts - Nuvar bhw ReinforcedDoors - Nuvar Blood Moon Until Dawn - JaxTeller718 Canned Food - JaxTeller718 Car Respawner - JaxTeller718 Chicken Coops - oakraven, with support from arramus CompoPack 21.4 - Too many to mention Cooking Stations - oakraven, with support from arramus Crafting Queue - JaxTeller718 Disable Falling Trees - Valmar Drawbridges - oakraven, with support from arramus Drs A20 PickItUp - Drconfused Eggs In Fridges - JaxTeller718 More Containers -
